detaileddescription.para: Every Zen device requires an SD card to work. On that SD card there should be a file named SAFEZEN.txt with personal settings.
There are 3 example files, the minimal required settings is device_id (see SAFEZEN_minimal.txt). Device id must be greater than 0 to work
Other settings can be added, see SAFEZEN_all_settings.txt for full options.
All settings can be changed (or will be added later) in the config screen of the device.
More info will be added in this readme at a later time.
